title: I need a therapist in Staten Island, can anyone recommend me one? I am a 12 year old girl and I need someone that specializes in anxiety and divorce. - Quora

response.answer_text: No honest practitioner is going to take on a 12 year old girl without either parental consent, or a referral from child services if parents are not providing care.
Contact your insurance company for a list of mental health providers. You can also find many that work via zoom.
